special.name: On the spot mutation
special.description: Whenever an attack eliminates one or more members of the mob, there is a 50% chance that each survivor gains a mutation like a sudden new body part or temporary magical aura. The GM chooses one of the following improvements, perhaps at random, and invents a new part or magic effect to explain it: extra melee attack, damage aura: 1d20 damage vs. any enemy that starts its turn engaged with the $name, or +4 bonus to AC..
